# dokploy_backup_files (Data Source)

Fetches the list of backup files from a destination storage.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `destination_id` (String) ID of the backup destination to list files from.
- `search` (String) Search prefix to filter backup files (e.g., backup prefix).

### Optional

- `server_id` (String) Optional server ID to filter backups by server.

### Read-Only

- `files` (Attributes List) List of backup files. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--files))

<a id="nestedatt--files"></a>
### Nested Schema for `files`

Read-Only:

- `etag` (String) The ETag of the file.
- `key` (String) The key (path) of the backup file in storage.
- `last_modified` (String) The last modification timestamp of the file.
- `size` (Number) The size of the file in bytes.
- `storage_class` (String) The storage class of the file.
